//---------------------------------------------------------------------
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>

#include <vector>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <deque>
#include <string>
#include <bitset>

#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

//---------------------------------------------------------------------

void imp() {
	printf("NO");
	exit(0);
}

char st[100000];

int main() {
	//freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);

	gets(st);
	int len = (int) strlen(st);
	if (len < 5) imp();
	int cnt = 0;
	for (int i=0; st[i]; i++)
		if (st[i] >= 'A' && st[i]<='Z') cnt++;
	if (cnt <= 0) imp();

	cnt = 0;
	for (int i=0; st[i]; i++)
		if (st[i] >= 'a' && st[i]<='z') cnt++;
	if (cnt<=0) imp();

	cnt = 0;
	for (int i=0; st[i]; i++)
		if (st[i] >= '0' && st[i]<='9') cnt++;
	if (cnt<=0) imp();

	printf("YES");

	return 0;
}
